description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Dungeon Dice Monsters is a Game Boy Advance dice-based tactics game based on an original board game
featured in the Yu-Gi-Oh! storyline.

v0.0.1.description:
First apworld release!

Contains the barebones functionality needed to be used (only shuffles duelist unlocks, no real randomization options present).
v0.0.1.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.0.1

v0.1.0.description:
New option: One Rematch
Allows players to add additional locations to their run by getting checks when defeating duelists for a second time.

New Feature:
Random Dice are now added as additional potential checks to be found to fill in any empty locations.

Bug Fixes:
Yami Yugi Defeated is now correctly named as the victory item.
No longer generated with empty locations (empty locations now have a matching number of random dice checks created)
v0.1.0.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description: Bug Fixes: Dice ID's are now correct in the apworlds data. Previously, most if not all dice had incorrect ID's meaning received dice were either giving you the wrong reward or not appearing entirely. This is now fixed.
v0.1.1.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.1.1

v0.2.0.description:
## v0.2.0 New Features
New Progression mode - Tournament
Starting Dice Pool can now be randomized
Free Duel Progression mode - You can now set the number of duelists you start with unlocked (instead of just 1)

## Bug Fixes
Fixed logic for Free Duel progression mode, Yami Yugi now appears in the proper sphere
v0.2.0.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
# v0.3.0 New Features
Bonus Item Mode Introduced - You can now choose whether your filler items are Random Dice or Shop Progression and Money. Choosing Shop Mode turns collecting dice into locations as well. A guide on Grandpa's Shop is now included in the documentation.

Dice Stats Modifier - You can now choose as a yaml option to double all crests on dice to reduce in-battle grinding.

All Shop Sale and Sell prices are now adjusted with a patch to allow players more collection building freedom.

Additional optional locations can now be added to Free Duel duelists and Tournaments!

You can now set the number of Free Duel Duelists required to be defeated before unlocking your goal fight (Yami Yugi)

# Documentation Links

[Info About YuGiOh DDM Randomizer](https://github.com/JustinMarshall98/Archipelago---YuGiOh-Dungeon-Dice-Monsters-GBA-/blob/main/worlds/yugiohddm/docs/en_YuGiOh!%20Dungeon%20Dice%20Monsters.md)
[Setup Guide](https://github.com/JustinMarshall98/Archipelago---YuGiOh-Dungeon-Dice-Monsters-GBA-/blob/main/worlds/yugiohddm/docs/setup_en.md)
[Grandpa's Shop Guide (New!)](https://github.com/JustinMarshall98/Archipelago---YuGiOh-Dungeon-Dice-Monsters-GBA-/blob/main/worlds/yugiohddm/docs/Grandpas%20Shop%20Guide.md)
v0.3.0.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
# v0.3.1 Bug Fixes

[Bonus Item Mode: Shop Progress]
Collecting a Crater Creator die now sends the check out.

[Bonus Item Mode: Random Dice]
Being awarded dice as items should no longer overwrite the number you have incorrectly towards the end of the list.

# Documentation Links

[Info About YuGiOh DDM Randomizer](https://github.com/JustinMarshall98/Archipelago---YuGiOh-Dungeon-Dice-Monsters-GBA-/blob/main/worlds/yugiohddm/docs/en_YuGiOh!%20Dungeon%20Dice%20Monsters.md)

v0.3.1.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.3.1

v0.3.2.description:
# v0.3.2 Bug Fixes

[Grandpa's Shop]
Fixed Dice Buying prices for the following dice: Jinzo, Barrel Dragon, Lord of D., Thousand eyes Restrict, Relinquished, Dark-eyes Illusionist, Red Archery Girl, Slot Machine, Magician of Black Chaos, Dokurorider.

v0.3.2.title: YGO DDM apworld v0.3.2
